articles.title: Polygenic prediction of preeclampsia and gestational hypertension - Nature.com
articles.description: A multi-ancestry genetic meta-analysis identifies 12 new loci associated with preeclampsia and gestational hypertension and proposes the integration of polygenic scores and clinical factors for disease prediction
